comment.author: 77235581@N00
comment._content: His birth was registered during the first quarter of 1897 at Macclesfield, Cheshire. He was born at Chelford, the son of Noel and Lilian Lee. The 1901 census puts him at Nether Alderley, Cheshire, near Macclesfield. He is aged 4 at the time, with his father Noel (33) a cotton manufaction merchant born at Bowden, Cheshire. His mother Lilian (32) was born at Newton Ferry in Wiltshire. His sister Josephine E, aged 3 also appears on the census form.
